Face Reality Skincare Moisture Balance Toner

Brand: Face Reality

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Aqua (Water), Alcohol, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Sodium Gluconate, O-cymen-5-OL, Sorbitol, Proline (L), Fructooligosaccharides (D-beta), Glucosamine HCl (D), Gluconolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate (L), Sodium Benzoate, Phenethyl

Lactate, Sodium PCA, Sodium Gluconate, O-cymen-5-OL, Sorbitol, Proline (L), Fructooligosaccharides (D-beta), Glucosamine HCl (D), Gluconolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate (L), Sodium Benzoate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
